enhancedForm.notice: This form supports comprehensive FHIR-compliant patient information including contact details, healthcare providers, and emergency contacts.
enhancedForm.complete: ✅ FHIR Patient Resource Implementation Complete - All 9 additional fields now supported!

deceased.title: Deceased Status
deceased.dateTimeHelper: Enter the date and time when the patient passed away
deceased.note: Please specify the date and time of death if known.

maritalStatus.title: Marital Status
maritalStatus.label: Marital Status
maritalStatus.helper: Select the patient's current marital status

telecom.title: Contact Information
telecom.emptyState: No contact entries added yet. Click 'Add Contact Entry' to get started.

photo.title: Patient Photo
photo.uploadHint: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select
photo.helpText: Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF. Maximum size: 5MB.

communication.title: Communication Preferences
communication.emptyState: No communication preferences set. Add languages that the patient speaks.
communication.helpText: Select languages the patient can communicate in. Mark preferred language for primary communication.

contact.title: Emergency Contacts & Related Persons
contact.emptyState: No emergency contacts added. Add important contacts for this patient.

generalPractitioner.title: Healthcare Practitioners
generalPractitioner.minSearchLength: Type at least 2 characters to search
generalPractitioner.noResults: No practitioners found matching your search
generalPractitioner.emptyState: No healthcare practitioner assigned. Search and select practitioner responsible for this patient's care.
generalPractitioner.helpText: Select healthcare practitioner who is responsible for this patient's ongoing care.

managingOrganization.title: Managing Organizations
managingOrganization.minSearchLength: Type at least 2 characters to search
managingOrganization.noResults: No organizations found matching your search
managingOrganization.emptyState: No managing organization selected. Choose the organization responsible for this patient's care.
managingOrganization.helpText: Select the primary organization responsible for managing this patient's care.

patientLink.title: Patient Relationships
patientLink.minSearchLength: Type at least 2 characters to search
patientLink.noResults: No patients found matching your search
patientLink.emptyState: No patient relationships established. Link this patient to related patient records.
patientLink.helpText: Establish relationships between this patient and other patient records in the system.

legacyContact.title: Legacy Contact Fields
legacyContact.deprecationNotice: ⚠️ These single contact fields are deprecated. Please use the enhanced Contact Information section above for better FHIR compliance.

messages.patientNotFound: The requested patient record could not be found. It may have been deleted or you may not have permission to view it.
messages.patientDetailsNotFound: The requested patient details could not be found. It may have been deleted or you may not have permission to view it.
messages.noResults: No patients available. Try adding a new patient.
messages.offlineUnavailable: Unable to load patients while offline
messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this patient?

errors.noPractitionersFound: No healthcare providers found matching your search. Try using different keywords.
errors.searchError: Unable to search for healthcare providers. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.loadingError: Error loading data. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your internet connection.
